    A

    Accounts - Class in Unnamed Package
    Accounts manages user data management, including the creation, modification, and deletion of stored users.
    Accounts() - Constructor for class Accounts
    Constructs a new Accounts object.
    addError(String) - Method in class ValidationResult
    Record an error message.
    addTransaction(String, String, double) - Method in class Budget
    Adds a new transaction to the user's budget for the year.
    addWarning(String) - Method in class ValidationResult
    Record a warning message.
    aggregateResults(ValidationResult...) - Method in class ValidationEngine
    Combine multiple ValidationResult objects into one rollup.
    applyAdjustments() - Method in class DeficitSolver
    Applies the identified adjustments to the user's expense data.
    applyExpenseChange(String, double) - Method in class ScenarioSimulator
    Applies a change to an expense category in the scenario.
    applyIncomeChange(String, double) - Method in class ScenarioSimulator
    Applies a change to an income source in the scenario.
    Authentication - Class in Unnamed Package
    Authentication handles all security related functionality, including password hashing and user verification.
    Authentication() - Constructor for class Authentication
    Constructs a new Authentication object.

    B

    Budget - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Budget class represents a user's financial data for a single calendar year.
    Budget() - Constructor for class Budget
    Constructs a new Budget object for the current year.

    C

    calculateAnnualSummary() - Method in class Budget
    Generates a summary of the user's annual financial performance.
    calculateBalance(int) - Method in class ReportManager
    Calculates the overall balance for the specified year (totalIncome - totalExpenses).
    calculateDeficit() - Method in class DeficitSolver
    Calculates the user's total financial deficit.
    calculateHighestExpenseCategory(Map<String, BigDecimal>) - Method in class ReportAnalyzer
    Returns the category with the largest (absolute) expense total.
    calculateMonthlyAverage(Map<Integer, BigDecimal>) - Method in class ReportAnalyzer
    Computes the average monthly total given a map of month totals.
    calculateMonthlyTotals() - Method in class Budget
    Calculates the total income and expenses (net total) for each month in the year.
    calculateSavingsTrend(Map<Integer, BigDecimal>, Map<Integer, BigDecimal>) - Method in class ReportAnalyzer
    Derives a per-month savings series defined as 'income - expenses' for each month.
    calculateTotalExpenses() - Method in class DataReader
    Calculates the total expenses by summing fixed, variable, and other expenses.
    calculateTotalIncome() - Method in class DataReader
    Calculates the total income by adding up all sources of income such as salary, wages, bonuses, tips, and other money received (e.g., alimony, child support, or government benefits like unemployment or Social Security).

    ReportManager - Class in Unnamed Package
    Manages loading data and orchestrating the generation and presentation of report artifacts Responsibilities include: Loading income/expense data for a given year Producing monthly, category, and yearly summaries Computing overall balance figures Exporting summaries to CSV and displaying reports on screen
    ReportManager() - Constructor for class ReportManager
